charges.charge_description: 18:661 THEFT OF PROPERTY WITHIN FEDERAL JURISDICTION(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Probation 5 years on each of cts 1 &; 2, conc, under the T/C of USPO and GO 318. Restitution $13,362.57. Special Assessment of $200.00. Total fine of $500.00, consisting of the following: Ct 1, a fine of $250.00, and ct 2, a fine o f $250.00.

charges.charge_description: 18:662 RECEIVING STOLEN PROPERTY WITHIN FEDERAL JURISDICTION(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Probation 5 years on each of cts 1 &; 2, conc, under the T/C of USPO and GO 318. Restitution $13,362.57. Special Assessment of $200.00. Total fine of $500.00, consisting of the following: Ct 1, a fine of $250.00, and ct 2, a fine o f $250.00.
